r1.name: Pyroclasm
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Brand''' launches a fireball at the target enemy that bounces between nearby enemies and '''Brand''' up to four times, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies each time.

If ''Pyroclasm's'' current target becomes invalid, it selects a new target at its remaining bounces. The fireball will bounce to '''Brand''' even if he becomes an invalid target while it is currently on a target or is in flight towards him. If there are no nearby valid targets, the fireball fizzles.
''Pyroclasm prioritizes enemy champions, then '''Brand''', then any valid bounce target.''
''The fireball bounces to targets regardless of having {{tip|sight}} of them or not.''
{{sbc|{{ai|Blaze|Brand|Ablaze}}:}} ''Pyroclasm'' {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies hit for {{fd|0.25}} seconds. This can affect the same enemy more than once.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Brand launches a fireball at the target enemy that bounces between nearby enemies and Brand up to four times, dealing magic damage to enemies each time.
If Pyroclasm's current target becomes invalid, it selects a new target at its remaining bounces. The fireball will bounce to Brand even if he becomes an invalid target while it is currently on a target or is in flight towards him. If there are no nearby valid targets, the fireball fizzles.
Pyroclasm prioritizes enemy champions, then Brand, then any valid bounce target.
The fireball bounces to targets regardless of having sight of them or not.
Ablaze: Pyroclasm slows enemies hit for 0.25 seconds. This can affect the same enemy more than once.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|100 to 300}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Total Single-Target Damage|{{ap|100*3 to 300*3}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* The fireball may only bounce to valid targets, including '''Brand'''.
* The fireball does not grant {{tip|sight}} of {{tip|stealth|stealthed}} enemies and those in fog of war but it can expose their position.
* If the initial cast target uses {{tip|spell shield}}, ''Pyroclasm'' will not bounce. If the bounce is blocked by an enemy's ''spell shield'' it will not deal any damage, but it will keep on bouncing.
* If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, dies, or '''Brand''' loses {{tip|sight}} of them during the cast time, ''Pyroclasm'' is cancelled but its {{sti|cooldown}} and {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} are refunded.

w1.name: Pillar of Flame
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{rutngt|0.625}} delay, '''Brand''' erupts the target area in flames, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: After a Unknown value: rutngt 0.625 delay, Brand erupts the target area in flames, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
Ablaze: Pillar of Flame deals 25% bonus damage.
w1.notes: * The delay before the eruption does not include the cast time. The delay would be a total of {{rutngt|0.889}} if it included the cast time.

e1.name: Conflagration
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Brand''' sets the target enemy aflame which also spreads to all enemies near them, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all targets.
''Conflagration spreads to enemies regardless of having {{tip|sight}} of them or not.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Brand sets the target enemy aflame which also spreads to all enemies near them, dealing magic damage to all targets.
Ablaze: Conflagration's spread radius is doubled.
Conflagration spreads to enemies regardless of having sight of them or not.

i1.name: Blaze
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Brand's''' [[champion ability|abilities]] apply a [[stack]] of ''Ablaze'' to affected enemies for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on further applications. Subsequent abilities used against a target with ''Ablaze'' are empowered. Enemies afflicted with ''Ablaze'' are dealt{{ft|{{as|3% of their '''maximum''' health}} over {{fd|3.25}} seconds|{{as|1% of their '''maximum''' health}} every {{fd|1.08{{recurring|3}}}} seconds over {{fd|3.25}} seconds}}as {{as|magic damage}}. ''Ablaze'' deals 120% damage per tick to {{tip|monsters}}, capped at 80.
Killing an enemy afflicted with ''Ablaze'' restores {{as|{{pp|20 to 40 for 7|1;3 to 18}} {{sti|mana}}}}.

Upon applying 3 stacks of ''Ablaze'' to large {{tip|monster|monsters}} or enemy {{tip|champion|champions}}, the fire becomes unstable, forming an area around the target that grants {{tip|sight}} within its radius and explodes after 2 seconds, consuming all stacks. All enemies within the detonation are dealt {{as|{{pp|key=%|10 to 14 for 17|1 to 17}} of their '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} as {{as|magic damage}} and applied a stack of ''Ablaze''. ''The explosion will still occur if the target dies to the ability applying the third stack or during the delay.''
'''Brand''' cannot stack ''Ablaze'' more than once on enemies who have exploded in the last 4 seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Brand's champion ability apply a stack of Ablaze to affected enemies for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on further applications. Subsequent abilities used against a target with Ablaze are empowered. Enemies afflicted with Ablaze are dealtas magic damage. Ablaze deals 120% damage per tick to monsters, capped at 80.
Killing an enemy afflicted with Ablaze restores 1;3 to 18 ‒ undefined mana.
Upon applying 3 stacks of Ablaze to large monsters or enemy champions, the fire becomes unstable, forming an area around the target that grants sight within its radius and explodes after 2 seconds, consuming all stacks. All enemies within the detonation are dealt 1 to 17 ‒ undefined of their maximum health (+ 2% per 100 AP) as magic damage and applied a stack of Ablaze. The explosion will still occur if the target dies to the ability applying the third stack or during the delay.
Brand cannot stack Ablaze more than once on enemies who have exploded in the last 4 seconds.
i1.notes:
* ''Ablaze'' is a debuff that persists through [[death]].
* The explosion is not considered a tether effect and will not affect {{tip|untargetable}} targets, even if the explosion originated from them.
* Each stack deals the damage individually and will always consider the time it was applied for deciding when the ticks will be applied, even when the duration refreshes.
** At sub-optimal applied times, 2 stacks will deal a minimum of {{as|6% '''maximum''' health}} damage over 4 seconds, but will deal {{as|7% '''maximum''' health}} at optimal applied times.
** Against small-medium units 3 stacks will deal a minimum of {{as|9% '''maximum''' health}} at sub-optimal times, but {{as|11% '''maximum''' health}} at optimal times. If these stacks are further {{tt|refreshed|By ablazing a target that's already at 3 stacks}} at optimal times they can deal up to {{as|12% '''maximum''' health}} over 4 seconds.
* The burn is {{tip|persistent damage}} and the explosion is {{tip|area damage}}.

q1.name: Sear
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Brand''' launches a fireball in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy it hits.
{{sbc|{{ai|Blaze|Brand|Ablaze}}:}} The target is also {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Brand launches a fireball in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy it hits.
Ablaze: The target is also stunned for 1.5 seconds.
q1.notes:
* With an ability haste value of {{ap|(<!--cooldown-->(8 to 6)/(<!--passive duration-->4-<!--cast time-->0.25+<!--range-->1100/<!--speed-->1600)-1)*100|round=ceil}}<!--minimum is reached when first hit is from maximum range and second from minimum--> to {{ap|((8 to 6)/(4-0.25-1100/1600)-1)*100|round=ceil}}<!--when first is at minimum and second at maximum--> based on the ranges of applications from the target, it is possible to apply the stun without having to use other abilities. ''Sear'' will apply before the duration of the pre-applied {{ai|Blaze|Brand}} times out.
** The needed ability haste value if you remained at the same range from the target for both casts would be {{ap|((8 to 6)/(4-0.25)-1)*100|round=ceil}}.
* ''Sear'' will cast from wherever '''Brand''' is at the end of the cast time.
